tasks.task: Research password validation requirements and best practices
Write the pseudocode for the password validator function
Translate pseudocode into actual programming language
Test the function with different password cases
Debug and refine the function based on test results

issues: Code does not handle the case where the input password is not a string
The password requires at least one special character from the set _@$ but not the entire set of special characters
The function returns different types (string instead of boolean)
suggestions: Add error handling for non-string inputs
Consider expanding the set of valid special characters
Return consistent data types, preferably boolean for validation functions
Instead of returning error messages as strings, consider raising exceptions for different error conditions
